name: Jumbla
tag_list: motion-graphics, e-commere, php-programming, websites, web-design, broadcast-design, tv-production, web-videos, explainer-videos, great-web-design
overview:
Jumbla is a communication design agency. We’re visual storytellers who make videos and websites to creatively share our clients’ messages with the world. We work for advertising agencies, production houses and direct clients.

We work closely with our clients to deliver stunning motion pieces from concept through to completion. Jumbla specialises in broadcast design, title design, visual effects and 2D/3D animation for television commercials and tv production, web videos and internal communications.

Jumbla’s digital design and development team are web industry experts. We produce beautiful and functional websites, Facebook apps, mobile sites and Flash banner campaigns. Our talents include e-commerce, social media, server management, Flash, PHP and Javascript programming.

Australian and international clients in the retail, film and advertising industries rely on Jumbla for creative problem solving and innovative results. Our passion and enthusiasm is continually winning us new business as we strive to be one of the most respected creative studios in the entire universe.
